posts.post_content:
I wanted to make an "X" deck with cards like [Flameblast Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flameblast Dragon ) and [Helix Pinnacle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Helix Pinnacle), along with four Rosheen Meanderers, until I realized she's a legendary creature. I don't like putting multiple legendary creatures of the same name in a deck.
  
   
The card is still good as a 4/4 for four mana. That stat to cost ratio is unheard of that early in the game.
posts.html:
